summary: Makes The Light/Studded Imperial Armor + Imperial Sword/Bow Craftable
descriptionHtml:
It always pissed me off that i couldn\'t Craft my own Imperial stuff so i made this Small mod
Imperial Armors have the same Crafting Costs as the heavy Vanilla Armor
Imperial Sword costs same as Steel Sword (Imp\' Sword found under Steel, dunno why...)
Imperial Bow costs 3 Firewood + 1 Leather Strip

Feel Free to Download, Install, Share, and Change this Mod
But for F.ck sake, keep it away from Skyrim Nexus!!
author: Warrior
